        @Autowired
public OrderBOMServiceImpl​(OrderBOMRepository orderBOMRepository,

                           BOMTemplateRepository bomTemplateRepository,
                           FabricRepository fabricRepository,
                           TrimRepository trimRepository,

                           SupplierRepository supplierRepository,
                           OrderBOMDetailRepository orderBOMDetailRepository,
                           PurchaseOrderService purchaseOrderService)
        The concrete implementation of the OrderBOMService interface. Contains all business logic for managing Order BOMs and generating Purchase Orders.

      • findAll

public java.util.List<OrderBOMDto> findAll()
        Specified by:

      • findOrCreateBySaleOrderId

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public OrderBOMDto findOrCreateBySaleOrderId​(java.lang.Long saleOrderId)
        Description copied from interface: OrderBOMService
        Finds an existing Order BOM by its associated Sale Order ID. If no BOM exists for the given Sale Order, it creates a new, empty OrderBOMDto shell.
        Specified by:
        findOrCreateBySaleOrderId in interface OrderBOMService
        Parameters:
        saleOrderId - The ID of the Sale Order.
        Returns:
        An existing OrderBOMDto (including details) or a new, empty OrderBOMDto linked to the Sale Order.

      • generatePreviewFromTemplate

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public OrderBOMDto generatePreviewFromTemplate​(java.lang.Long saleOrderId,
                                               java.lang.Long bomTemplateId)
        Description copied from interface: OrderBOMService
        Generates a preview of what the Order BOM details would look like if based on a specific BOM Template. This is used to populate the form when a user selects a template, before saving.
        Specified by:
        generatePreviewFromTemplate in interface OrderBOMService
        Parameters:
        saleOrderId - The ID of the target Sale Order (used for calculating quantities).
        bomTemplateId - The ID of the BOM Template to use as a base.
        Returns:
        An OrderBOMDto populated with details derived from the template, but not yet saved.

      • save

        @Transactional
public OrderBOMDto save​(OrderBOMDto dto)
        Saves an Order BOM with an intelligent synchronization strategy for its details. It updates existing lines, adds new ones, and safely removes deleted lines (only if they haven't been used in a Purchase Order).
        Specified by:
        save in interface OrderBOMService
        Parameters:
        dto - The OrderBOMDto object containing the data to save.
        Returns:
        The saved OrderBOMDto object, potentially with updated IDs or audit fields.

      • saveAndGeneratePOs

        @Transactional
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> saveAndGeneratePOs​(OrderBOMDto bomDtoFromForm)
        Description copied from interface: OrderBOMService
        Saves the Order BOM and then automatically generates Purchase Orders (POs) based on the calculated purchase quantities for items not already included in a PO.
        Specified by:
        saveAndGeneratePOs in interface OrderBOMService
        Parameters:
        bomDtoFromForm - The OrderBOMDto submitted from the form, containing potential purchase quantities.
        Returns:
        A map containing a success message or potentially other result information.
